Franz Liszt

Consolations, S. 172

1849–1850 · LW A111b · R. 12

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 16'

  • 1. E major
  • 2. E major
  • 3. D-flat major
  • 4. D-flat major
  • 5. E major
  • 6. E major

This collection exists in an earlier version (S. 171a; LW A111a) and a later version (S. 172; LW A111b; R. 12). In the second version, the third piece is replaced entirely, and the other five pieces are revisions from the first version. Liszt made arrangements for organ of nos. 3–6 from the second version (S. 672d; LW E22).

Recommended editions

  • New Liszt Edition (Editio Musica Budapest) · I/9 · Z. A/B 8011 · Various Cyclical Works I · ed. Imre Mező / Imre Sulyok
  • New Liszt Edition (Editio Musica Budapest) · Suppl. 10 · Z. A/B 14505 · ed. Adrienne Kaczmarczyk / Ágnes Sas [album leaf for no. 1]
  • Associated Board · Twenty-one Short Piano Pieces · ed. Howard Ferguson
  • Editio Musica Budapest · Z. 12697 · ed. Imre Mező / Imre Sulyok / Adrienne Kaczmarczyk / Ágnes Sas [including album leaf for no. 1]
  • Henle · HN 465 · ed. Ernst-Günter Heinemann / Mária Eckhardt
  • Peters · EP 7820 · ed. Leslie Howard
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50165 · ed. Sabine Ziegler
